introduction:
If you're already registered with VOSA, you can book, reschedule or cancel the following tests for multiple vehicles:

* annual tests

* paid retests

* prohibition clearances

* Reduced Pollution Certificate (RPC) and Low Emissions Certificate (LEC) tests

* voluntary tests
more_information:
The multiple test booking service is available to registered users only.

To register you'll need your membership and confirmation numbers from VOSA. 

If you can't find these, contact: 

$C 
**VOSA Helpline**
<webbookings@vosa.gov.uk>  
0300 123 9000  
$C

If you haven't registered for this service, then you can [book an annual test for a single vehicle](http://www.gov.uk/book-a-single-annual-test-online "Book an annual test for a single vehicle"){:rel="external"} without needing to register.

##What you can't book

You can't use this service to book:

* part paid retests 
* technical tests (eg first-time trailer test) 
* vehicle identity check 
* Individual Vehicle Approval or motorcycle Single Vehicle Approval tests

##Cancelling, rescheduling and viewing bookings

You'll need the order reference number you were given when the original booking was made, eg 1-212101212. 

You can also use this service to manage your VOSA pre-funded account, and update your contact details.

^You can't cancel within 3 days of a test or you'll lose your fee. You also can't reschedule on the day of a test.^

*[VOSA]: Vehicle and Operator Services Agency
